com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.Machine

  • Packages that use Machine 
    Package Description
    com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans
    Platform adapter together with the platform event source and the machine catalog.

    • Uses of Machine in com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans

      Methods in com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans that return types with arguments of type Machine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Stream<Machine> PlatformContext.available()
      All available machines on the platform.
      static <F extends MachineFacet>
      Function<Machine,Stream<F>>      		 Machine.facetFilter(Class<F> type)
      Function that, given a machine and a facet type, returns a Stream with a machine if that type is implemented.
      static <F extends MachineFacet>
      Function<Machine,Optional<F>>      		 Machine.facetGet(Class<F> type)
      Function that, given a machine and a facet type, returns an Optional with a machine if that type is implemented.
      Optional<Machine> PlatformContext.lookup(MachineRef ref)
      The machine identified by the specified reference, if available.
